Of course he, as anyone who is human would be, is extremely embarrassed by the endless publicity and speculation about what happened many years ago when he was editor of the News of the World. But he praised Mr Andy Coulson 's performance in his current role, saying the Downing Street press office worked in a very "proper" way and he had not received a single complaint.

According to Google, these executive changes will help to streamline the decision-making process and "create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company." We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, comments Eric Schmidt .
